text: 6 members of President Trump's campaign staff who were in Tulsa, Oklahoma, to setup for the president's campaign rally tested positive for the coronavirus, the campaign says; staffers who tested positive will not be in attendance at Saturday’s rally. https://t.co/OnesCLFYOy
